column1:
EVERY TIME I SEE CORONAVIRUS MY BRAIN KEEPS SAYING CARNIVORES

ANY THOUGHTS?

People misinterpret the Spanish Flu because it had a 10-15% fatality and affected people with healthy immune systems, and was much different than average strains of the coronavirus. a high amount of people are infected and fatality rates are low.
